page.title: 19Trade.
page.content: The two main shops in Kyleakin are the filling station and Camerons.The filling station sells sweets and drinks etc.They hire out mopeds in the summer. Camerons sell the same but they do not hire out mopeds. Camerons is the shop just beside the Kyleakin to Kyle ferry. There are two restaurants in Kyleakin they are Macdermaids and the Crofters Kitchen. There are three hotels in Kyleakin they are the Kings Arms,White Heather and Dunringell. Macdougalls Removels go all over Britain and they work on car engines and change tyres of cars and lorries. Kishorn is another place where men from Kyleakin work.In Kishorn they make oil rigs and tow them out to the North Sea.
